resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

string.name: scan_busy
string.description: Button text to indicate that no scan can be started because scanning is already in progress [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: scan_available
string.description: Button text to start scanning the current camera image [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: clear
string.description: Button text to clear detected objects from the camera view [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: use_cloud_ml
string.description: Label text displayed on a switch to toggle the Cloud ML model [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
